price: "Inda duk kuka kasance, mutuwa zã ta riske ku, kuma kõ da kun kasance ne a cikin gãnuwõyi ingãtattu!" Kuma idan wani alhẽri ya sãme su sai su ce: "Wannan daga wurin Allah ne," kuma idan wata cũta ta sãme su, sai su ce: "Wannan daga gare ka ne."Ka ce: "Dukkansu daga Allah ne." To, me ya sãmi waɗannan mutãne, bã su kusantar fahimtar magana?
arabic: أَيۡنَمَا تَكُونُواْ يُدۡرِككُّمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ وَلَوۡ كُنتُمۡ فِي بُرُوجٖ مُّشَيَّدَةٖۗ وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ حَسَنَةٞ يَقُولُواْ هَٰذِهِۦ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ سَيِّئَةٞ يَقُولُواْ هَٰذِهِۦ مِنۡ عِندِكَۚ قُلۡ كُلّٞ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۖ فَمَالِ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ لَا يَكَادُونَ يَفۡقَهُونَ حَدِيثٗا

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
